Kwadwo Nkansah (a mụrụ na 15 Eprel 1987) nke a maara dịka Lil Win, bụ onye Ghana na-ese ihe, onye egwu, onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-eme ihe ọchị. A mụrụ Kwadwo Nkansah nye Madam Adwoa Afrah na Maazị Kwadwo Boadi Nkansah
Ya na ụmụnne ya isii ndị ọzọ tolitere na Kwaman na mpaghara Ashanti. Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye nduzi nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Great Minds International na Kumasi, mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana.
Kwadwo Nkansah si Ahenkro Kwaman, na mpaghara Ashanti nke Ghana.
Kwadwo enweghị ike ịgụcha ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, ọ kwụsịrị na ọkwa isii ma ọ nweghị ike ịga n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya.
O meriri "Favorite Actor" na mbipụta nke isii nke Ghana Movie Awards (GMAs) kwa afọ n'afọ 2015.
Òtù Mba Ndị Dị n'Otu kwanyeere ya ùgwù maka mkpọsa ya megide mbata iwu na-akwadoghị na West Africa.
